page.title: 07P.C.Maxwell.
page.content: Police Constable Maxwell is our local police man. He covers the areas of Highclere, Woolton Hill and East End. The job involves protecting life, detecting crime and attending traffic accidents. A person can join the police force when he or she is eighteen and a half years old. He has twenty days holiday a year, he has a motar cycle to help him. When the policeman walks the beat he carries a truncheon. He uses this to hit criminals on the elbow. Policemen have to retire after thirty years service. P.C.Maxwell told us some funny stories. Here is one of them. P.C.Maxwell went to a scene of an accident. He discovered two cars up a telegraph pole. The bottam car was holding up the top car.
